targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{group="$group", job="$job", area="heap", service="$service"})*100/sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{group="$group", job="$job", area="heap", service="$service"})
sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{group="$group", job="$job", area="nonheap", service="$service"})*100/sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{group="$group", job="$job", area="nonheap", service="$service"})
rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{group="$group", action="end of minor GC",  job="$job", service="$service"}[1m])
rate(jvm_gc_pause_seconds_count{group="$group", action="end of major GC",  job="$job", service="$service"}[1m])
